tooltip.cupsaddons.fuel_item_instruction: §8§oRight click with the required fuel in your off-hand to fuel this item.
tooltip.cupsaddons.use_item_mainhand_ins: §eRight click with this item in your main-hand to use it.
tooltip.cupsaddons.use_item_offhand_inst: §eRight click with this item in your off-hand to use it.
tooltip.cupsaddons.scrap_description: §8Can be crafted from dozens of items. Helpful for organization.
tooltip.cupsaddons.crysophilists_pickaxe:
§7While fueled, mined §fStone§7 or §fOre§7 blocks will drop an additional §6Raw Gold§7, plus 1/3 chance for an additional §6Raw Gold§7 for every level of §6Fortune§7. Some blocks won't drop themselves. Without fuel, the pickaxe acts as normal.
§fThis tool is Unbreakable§7.

§6Netherite§8 tier pickaxe.

Fueled ability works on the following tags: 
§6Blocks.ORE_BEARING_GROUND_DEEPSLATE§8
§6Blocks.ORE_BEARING_GROUND_NETHERRACK§8
§6Blocks.ORE_BEARING_GROUND_STONE§8
§6Blocks.ORES_IN_GROUND_STONE§8
§6Blocks.ORES_IN_GROUND_DEEPSLATE§8
§6Blocks.ORES_IN_GROUND_NETHERRACK§8
tooltip.cupsaddons.neanderthals_pickaxe_:
§7While fueled, mined §fStone§7 or §fOre§7 blocks will drop an additional §6Raw Iron§7 and §6Coal§7, plus one more of each for every level of §6Fortune§7. Some blocks won't drop themselves. Without fuel, the pickaxe acts as normal.
§fThis tool is Unbreakable§7.

§6Stone§8 tier pickaxe.

Fueled ability works on the following tags: 
§6Blocks.ORE_BEARING_GROUND_DEEPSLATE§8
§6Blocks.ORE_BEARING_GROUND_NETHERRACK§8
§6Blocks.ORE_BEARING_GROUND_STONE§8
§6Blocks.ORES_IN_GROUND_STONE§8
§6Blocks.ORES_IN_GROUND_DEEPSLATE§8
§6Blocks.ORES_IN_GROUND_NETHERRACK§8
tooltip.cupsaddons.ferromagnetic_object_:
§d
Active ability:§r
§6- Knocks back all surrounding entities that are wearing §eIron§6 or §eChainmail§6 armor.
- Ignores players.

§dPassive ability:§r
§5- Wearing §dIron§5 or §dChainmail§5 armor grants effects:
  §5- §6+1 Armor Point§5 per §darmor piece§5.
  §5- §6+2 Armor Points§5 bonus for wearing a §dfull set§5.
